title: Moderate-speed city driving on a clear day with 7 braking events.
caption: The ego vehicle drives straight on a foggy city street, passing a red car and a traffic light.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 3 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (customWeather). The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed (average speed â‰ˆ 7.6 m/s). There are 7 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The road is a straight, two-lane city street with a foggy atmosphere. The ego vehicle is driving at a moderate speed, passing a red car on the left side. There are several traffic lights and street signs along the road. The weather is clear, and there is no rain or snow.
reasoning: The ego vehicle maintains a moderate speed because it is driving in a city environment where the speed limit is lower. It slows down when approaching a traffic light and brakes when necessary to avoid collisions with other vehicles or pedestrians. The foggy conditions require the driver to be extra cautious and attentive to the road ahead.
